com.amazonaws.amplify.auth

Interface OAuthSignInProvider<D,R,T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SignInProvider<D,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FacebookSignInProvider, GoogleSignInProvider

    public interface OAuthSignInProvider<D,R,T>
extends SignInProvider<D,R>
    Extends SignInProvider to include scopes used in OAuth protocol.
